summary: This document is an internal FBI email chain discussing Ghislaine Maxwell's bail hearing on July 14, 2020. It indicates she was denied bail and mentions a request for a Sensitive Compartmented Information (SCN) notification after the hearing.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the email discussion; her bail hearing occurred and she was denied bail.

events.title: Maxwell Bail Hearing
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's bail hearing took place, and she was denied bail.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was denied bail at her hearing on July 14, 2020.
The FBI's Crimes Against Children and Human Trafficking Unit was actively monitoring the hearing.
There was a request for a Sensitive Compartmented Information (SCN) notification following the hearing.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination regarding Maxwell's case.
